/*

*/
`line 1 "somefile" 2

----

(source_file
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (comment)
  (line_compiler_directive
    (unsigned_number)
    (filename)
    (level)))
